snippet: Once a power, the Netherlands is mired in a downturn, having failed to qualify for this summer’s European Championship. Now it is plotting a way forward.
abstract: Netherlands' national soccer team, whose third-place 2014 World Cup finish was followed by embarrassing exit from European Championships, aims to rebuild by rethinking its long-revered but seemingly stale approach to player development.
lead_paragraph: Once a power, the Netherlands is mired in a downturn, having failed to qualify for this summer’s European Championship. Now it is plotting a way forward.

headline.main: Dutch National Soccer Program Looks for a Total Reboot
headline.print_headline: Netherlands Looks for a Total Reboot
